column4: Hello.  I have a question.  My mother just gave me her old laptop.  It is a Compaq Presario 2100.  I believe it has 256 RAM, 2.0ghz, WinXP Home.  However, when I go to Properties it says it has 192 RAM.  Would it be better for me to install Linux and if so should I go for the Netbook version of ubuntu or the desktop?  Would it make any difference on which one I used?  Would it increase the
Okay.  Thanks.  I will try Xubuntu because WinXP is super slow on this machine.
did you try plain ubuntu first?
